house_listing.house_description: This 1 level detached single family home built in 1920 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 3 car garage and approximately 1400 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, dining room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: One Source Realty/Better Homes One Source Realty/Better Homes

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Den, Dining Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
